_doc: Tracks per-skill evaluation status with independent routing and content dimensions. Updated by tasks .2-.5. routing_status tracks L3/L4 routing quality; content_status tracks L5/L6 content quality.

_transitions..3: sets routing_status to fixed; promoted to verified when targeted re-run evidence is recorded
_transitions..4: sets content_status to fixed; promoted to verified when --runs 3 --regenerate re-run confirms
_transitions..5: performs quality bar sweep, promotes fixed->verified where evidence exists, documents exceptions
_transitions.overall_status: worst-of roll-up across routing_status and content_status (ignoring untested): needs-fix > fixed > passing > verified; exception overrides if any dimension is exception

_quality_bar_summary.L4_confusion: PASS (all 7 groups >= 60% accuracy, cross-activation <= 35%, negative controls 88.9%)
_quality_bar_summary.L5_effectiveness: PASS (all skills >= 50% win rate, micro-avg 87.5%, effectiveness_d702e16b pre-.4). PENDING_REVERIFICATION for .4-edited skills (dotnet-xunit, dotnet-csharp-coding-standards).
_quality_bar_summary.L6_size_impact: PENDING_REVERIFICATION (pre-fix: 51.7% full wins, 1 baseline sweep (xunit) + 1 zero-full-wins (coding-standards with tie); .4 fixes applied but re-run needed from external session)

dotnet-architecture-patterns.notes: Fixed false negative (act-005). Verified via targeted activation re-run activation_5fd7c96e after commit 5a00da0: act-005 passes, 17P/2F (neg-016 parse_failure, neg-018 messaging-patterns known issue).

dotnet-system-commandline.notes: Fixed false negative (act-012). Verified via targeted activation re-run activation_ca91bea3 after commit 92fb8b8: act-012 passes, 17P/2F (neg-016 api-security FP, neg-018 messaging-patterns known issue).

dotnet-resilience.notes: Fixed false negative (act-017). Verified via targeted activation re-run activation_8a8e5c77 after commit 92fb8b8: act-017 and act-054 pass, 18P/2F (neg-016 parse_failure, neg-018 multi-activation). L5 win_rate=100%.

dotnet-container-deployment.notes: Fixed false positive (neg-004). Verified via targeted activation re-run activation_5fd7c96e after commit 5a00da0: neg-004 now passes. Pre-fix run activation_1ef0e510 confirmed neg-004 was failing.

dotnet-messaging-patterns.notes: neg-018 (generic RabbitMQ prompt) still activates this skill. Fix attempts in .3 (commits 5a00da0, de9b8e7) added .NET + MassTransit/Azure Service Bus qualifiers, but could not eliminate FP without losing .NET messaging coverage. Exception decision based on recorded runs activation_3925edef and activation_5fd7c96e; re-run after de9b8e7 not yet captured in run_ids. Overall L3 metrics still pass with this exception (2/18 neg controls affected).
dotnet-messaging-patterns.exception_reason: neg-018 is deliberately ambiguous (generic RabbitMQ). Skill must activate for .NET messaging use cases. Cannot further narrow description without losing true positive coverage.

dotnet-efcore-architecture.notes: L4 data group 80% (1 case routed to advisor). Group still above 60% threshold per confusion_e3f1b006.

dotnet-xunit.notes: L6 baseline sweep addressed by trimming body from 17.5KB to 8.7KB (pending re-verification via verify-content-fixes.sh). L5 pre-fix win_rate=83.3% (already passing).
